poem:
**The Unseen Dance**

No music guides  
the feet of silence,  
nor the eyes that trace  
the bones of air.  
In alternate spaces,  
movement whispers  
to the shadows of thought,  
poised on the edge  
of possibility,  
alive in the breath  
of absence,  
daring us  
to see  
what is not.
